name: Nelson Tethers: Puzzle Agent
description:
Nelson Tethers: Puzzle Agent is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 30-06-2010. It was published by Telltale Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Nelson Tethers: Puzzle Agent is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
Matt Hansen produced the game. It was scored by Jared Emerson-Johnson, Nick Mastroianni and Rich Vreeland.
